text:
Indra Renewable Technologies | Senior Software Engineer | Malvern, UK | ONSITE, but flexible | https://www.indra.co.uk/

Developing embedded software for next generation smart energy products for Electric Vehicles and Home Integration as well as Electric Vehicle conversions

Experience in modern C++ development is required. Some experience with embedded programming is preferred.

More information: https://www.indra.co.uk/software-engineer
